doc:
Martin Starr https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Martin_Starr 0 Martin Starr (born Martin James Pflieger Schienle) is an American actor and comedian. He is known for the television roles of Bill Haverchuck on the short-lived comedy-drama Freaks and Geeks (1999–2000), Roman DeBeers on the comedy series Party Down (2009–2010), and Bertram Gilfoyle in the HBO series Silicon Valley (2014–present), as well as for his film roles in Knocked Up (2007), Adventureland (2009) and Spider-Man: Homecoming (2017). Martin_Starr ( born Martin_James_Pflieger_Schienle ) is an_American_actor_and_comedian . He is_known for the_television_roles of Bill_Haverchuck on the_short-lived_comedy-drama_Freaks and Geeks_(_1999 – 2000_) , Roman_DeBeers on the_comedy_series_Party_Down_(_2009 – 2010_) , and Bertram_Gilfoyle in the_HBO_series_Silicon_Valley ( 2014 – present_) , as_well_as for his_film_roles in Knocked Up (_2007_) , Adventureland_(_2009_)_and_Spider-Man : Homecoming_(_2017_) .
